title: Covercraft UVS100 Custom Sunscreen | UV10993SV | Compatible with Select Mazda CX-7 Models, Silver
features: ***Sunscreen has a 2-piece design for optimal fit
Custom fit to the windshield for complete coverage
Protect the dash and other interior components from damage by the sun
Reduce the interior temperature of the vehicle on hot days
The foam core center of the shield acts as an insulator
Easy to use and store away when not in use
description: The UVS100 Custom Sunscreen is an affordable way to protect the interior of your vehicle from damaging UV rays as well as adding a level of comfort and protection by reducing the interior temperature of the vehicle on hot days. The sunscreen is made to fit your exact windshield, providing maximum coverage to keep your vehicle cooler.
